room_title: Escape room "Goliath" by Headcase Escape Adventures in Pigeon Forge
room_description:
What started as a fun vacation getaway quickly turns into a deadly game of escape when you and your group of friends discover a remote cabin in the heart of the Smokies. This cabin has a dangerous secret…a vicious, man-eating Black Bear.

Local legend tells a story of “Goliath”, an abnormally large and powerful ravenous black bear that has claimed the cabin as part of his territory. He has taken the lives of many intruders and longs to prey on anyone who dares cross his path. If you can escape in time, you may have a chance of surviving a run in with Goliath!
